resources.string: Before you are able to play any music, make sure you have installed a Synthesizer application. Some recommended applications that are available on Google Play Store are: FluidSynth and OPL3. These will provide this application with Sound Fonts which is what creates the musical sounds.

To choose your chosen Synthesizer, simply click on the area circled in red as shown below. This will expand the list of synthesizers that you have installed. Choose the one you want and the app will automatically connect to it!
